plot: Note: Editions of The Tenant that start with: "You must go back with me..." are incomplete. Actual opening line of the novel is: "To J. Halford, Esq. Dear Halford, when we were together last..."This is the story of a woman's struggle for independence. Helen "Graham" has returned to Wildfell Hall in flight from a disastrous marriage. Exiled to the desolate moorland mansion, she adopts an assumed name and earns her living as a painter.
characters: Helen Graham, Gilbert Markham, Arthur Huntingdon, Eliza Millward, Frederick Lawrence, Milicent Hargrave, Esther Hargrave, Walter Hargrave, Arthur Huntingdon-Jr., Rachel (The Tenant of Wildfell Hall)
